facial_features.eyes: deep-set almond eyes with intense gaze, dark brown irises with subtle gold flecks, naturally defined brows with elegant arch
facial_features.nose: refined straight nose with delicate bridge and soft tip
facial_features.lips: full balanced lips with natural cupid's bow, warm rose undertone
facial_features.cheekbones: high sculpted cheekbones with natural definition
facial_features.jawline: soft oval face shape with gentle jawline and refined chin
facial_features.overall: editorial model beauty with harmonious proportions, warm refined features, naturally elegant and photogenic
